Title: Clarity
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon, Ron Nyswaner, Anya Leta (staff writer)
Actors: Claire Danes, Elizabeth Marvel, Linus Roache, Mandy Patinkin
Plot: Carrie needs to choose a side. Keane needs an ally. Saul has an idea.
